text: Pete 'n' Tillie is a 1972 American comedy movie directed by Martin Ritt and was based on the 1968 novella Witch's Milk by Peter De Vries. It stars Walter Matthau, Geraldine Page, Carol Burnett, Barry Nelson, Lee H. Montgomery and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1973. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1972 comedy movies Category:1972 LGBT movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Martin Ritt
title: Pete 'n' Tillie
